description: The get_vifs_by_instance() call in the nova.network.neutronv2.api module is not implemented.
title: Calls to get_vifs_by_instance are not implemented when using neutron

comments.content: The get_vifs_by_instance() call in the nova.network.neutronv2.api module is not implemented.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~beagles

comments.content: Not sure if this is intentional or not.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mriedem

comments.content:
Hi,
Please see:

    def get_vif_by_mac_address(self, context, mac_address):
        """Returns the vifs record for the mac_address."""
        # NOTE(vish): This is no longer used but can't be removed until
        #             we major version the network_rpcapi to 2.0.
        # NOTE(russellb) No need to object-ify this since
        # get_vifs_by_instance() is unused and set to be removed.
        vif = self.db.virtual_interface_get_by_address(context,
                                                        mac_address)
        if vif.get('network_id') is not None:
            network = self._get_network_by_id(context, vif['network_id'])
            vif['net_uuid'] = network['uuid']
        return vif

I do not think that this is a bug

Thanks
Gary
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~garyk

comments.content: The above comment appears in code that is in internal RPC server, not the nova-network API implementation. It seems reasonable that we should implement it.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~beagles

comments.content: Hrm this method is still used in: api/openstack/compute/contrib/extended_virtual_interfaces_net.py
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~arosen

comments.content:
Change abandoned by Jakub Libosvar (<email address hidden>) on branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/98386
Reason: Abandoning per garyk's comment.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content:
Gary's comment only applies to the manager implementations in nova, not the API and this code is called from contrib. 

Since this throws a NotImplemented when neutron is used, what is it we want to do here:

- consider it a "known issue" and live with the neutron case not working
- get rid of the functionality across the board so it isn't relevant anymore
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~beagles
